scripts.prebuild: npm test && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp manifest.json sidepanel.html dist/ && cp icons/*.png dist/icons/
scripts.build: esbuild sidepanel.js background.js content.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --minify && npm run build:css
scripts.zip: mkdir -p release && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./dist/manifest.json').version") && cd dist && zip -r ../release/vishpr-extension-$VERSION.zip . && cd .. && echo "Created release/vishpr-extension-$VERSION.zip"
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
